example.eg: The kids gathered some sticks for the fire.
example.egtrans: 小孩捡来一些枯枝生火。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 树枝, 树杈, 树杈

example.eg: The cook stuck the knife into the mango.
example.egtrans: 厨师把刀戳进芒果里。

example.eg: Let me stick this notice on the board.
example.egtrans: 让我把这个通知贴在布告板上。

example.eg: Jim licked the stamp and stuck it to the envelope.
example.egtrans: 吉姆舔了一下邮票，将邮票贴在信封上。

example.eg: The glue stuck to my fingers and I had to scrub for 10 minutes to remove it.
example.egtrans: 胶水粘在我的手指上了，我揉了10分钟才弄干净。

example.eg: They used five sticks of dynamite to blow the hole in the rock.
example.egtrans: 他们使用五根炸药棒来炸开岩块上的缺口。

example.eg: The police used their sticks to control the crowd.
The hockey player broke his stick and needed another one.
example.egtrans: 曲棍球运动员弄坏了自己的球棒，所以需要换一支。

example.eg: The pilot pulled back on the stick to fly higher.
example.egtrans: 飞行员回拉驾驶杆，来使飞机飞向更高处。

example.eg: I need a stick of butter for this recipe.
example.egtrans: 做这道菜，我需要四分之一磅的黄油。

example.eg: The old man leaned on his stick as he stood watching the children run across the field.
example.egtrans: 在那位老人看着孩子们在田野上奔跑时，他倚靠在自己的拐杖上。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 拐杖, 拐棍, 手杖

example.eg: Karen got a lot of stick off her colleagues for the mistake she'd made.
example.egtrans: 由于自己犯下的过失，凯伦受到了许多来自同事的指责。

example.eg: Rosemary lives on a farm in the sticks.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 偏远地区, 边远地区

example.eg: I was shifting into third gear when the gear lever suddenly stuck.
example.egtrans: 当挡杆突然动不了的时候，我正在挂三挡。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 无法移动, 陷在, 陷住

example.eg: The fly stuck to the sticky trap.
example.egtrans: 苍蝇粘在了捕蝇板上。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 粘着, 粘住, 粘在

example.eg: The zipper stuck halfway up.
example.egtrans: 拉链拉到一半就卡住了。

example.eg: Barry's brothers gave him the nickname "Bud" when he was a child, and it stuck.
example.egtrans: 在巴里孩提时代，兄弟们给他起了个小名：“小芽”，这名字就这样持续了下去。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 保留, 留存, 持续

example.eg: Julie stuck the plastic with a pin to drain the water.
The spear stuck the explorer through the heart.
example.egtrans: 长矛贯穿了探险者的心脏。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 刺穿，贯穿, 插入, 戳进

example.eg: The dog stuck his head out the window.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 伸出, 使处于某种位置

example.eg: Harry's friends stuck him with the dinner bill.
I don't think I can stick much more of this film; it's abysmal!
example.egtrans: 我觉得自己不能再忍受这部片子了，它简直没完没了，烂透了！

example.eg: If you stick around after the closing credits, you will catch the movie's extra scene.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 逗留, 停留, 留下, 等着

example.eg: Joel stuck by his opinion, despite all the arguments to the contrary.
Nowadays you don't have to lick the edge of an envelope before you stick it down.
If you stick your tongue out again, a bird may come and roost on it.
Other children tease him because his ears stick out.
The young man's blue Mohawk stuck out in the corporate offices.
By the twentieth mile of the marathon, Adam was exhausted, but he stuck the race out and finally made it to the finish line.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 坚持完成, 坚持到底

dsense.name: stick [sb/sth] up, stick up [sb/sth]
dsense.guideword: informal (carry out armed robbery on) (俚语)

example.eg: A gang stuck up that bank over there last week.
example.egtrans: 上周，有一伙歹徒持枪抢劫了那家银行。

example.eg: When the bullies came around, he stuck up for his little sister.

dsense.name: stick with [sth], stick at [sth], stick to [sth]
dsense.guideword: informal (not vary or deviate from) (非正式用语)

example.eg: If I stick with this diet, I should be able to wear my favorite pants again by Christmas.
example.egtrans: 只要能继续坚持这样的膳食计划，我应该就能在圣诞节前再次穿上我最喜欢的裤子了。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 坚持做某事，继续做某事, 遵守

example.eg: She had been a good friend who had stuck with me through thick and thin.
example.egtrans: 她是一位好朋友，无论我的人生处于高潮还是低谷，都一直忠于我。

dsense.name: Chap Stick, ChapStick, chapstick, chap stick

example.eg: I always keep a Chap Stick handy in case my lips get dry.
I like to put a cinnamon stick in my hot apple cider.

dsense.name: gearshift (US), shift lever (US), gear stick, gear lever (UK)

example.eg: I always waggle the gear stick before starting the engine, to make sure it is in neutral.  This car's gearshift is on the steering column.
example.egtrans: 发动引擎前，我总是会摇一摇变速杆，确保变速杆处于中心位置。这辆车的变速杆在转向轴上。

example.eg: I used a glue stick to paste my collage together.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 固体胶棒, 固体胶水

example.eg: Hand blenders are great for making thick soups.
Stop hitting your brother with that hockey stick!
The lacrosse stick is used to catch, carry and throw the ball.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 长曲棍球棒, 兜网球棒

example.eg: My meanest middle school teacher used to hit children with the measuring sticks!
I use a memory stick to back up my files.  I copied my photos onto my memory stick so that I can show them to my friends on their laptops.
Eggs are best cooked in a nonstick pan.

dsense.name: popsicle stick
dsense.guideword: US, ® (stick used as ice-lolly handle) (商标)

example.eg: I'll apologise, but it sticks in my craw; I know I was in the right.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 如鲠在喉, 难以忍受之事

dsense.name: stick in your mind
dsense.guideword: informal, figurative (remain in your thoughts or memory)

dsense.name: stick insect, also US: stick bug, walking stick

trans_examp.trans_cn: 坚持己见, 固执己见

example.eg: We will stick together through thick and thin!

trans_examp.trans_cn: 团结一致, 齐心协力

example.eg: The plot of the novel didn't make sense because several pages had stuck together.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 连贯一致, 粘贴在一起, 黏附在一起
棒式吸尘器, 棒式真空吸尘器
顽固保守者, 墨守成规的人

example.eg: Because of his limp, Mr. Williams always used a walking stick.

dsense.name: walking stick
dsense.guideword: US, colloquial (insect: resembles a stick) (昆虫)

dsense.name: the wrong end of the stick

example.eg: I'm not having an affair with your wife! I was just comforting her because she was upset; you've got hold of the wrong end of the stick.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 搞错, 误解, 弄错
